Knock_Away.display_help: You kick your target, dealing smashing damage and knocking them back. This also boosts your morale, increasing all damage for a short time.
Knock_Away.display_target_help: You have been kicked away from the Black Feather!

Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You launch a blazing arrow at your foe, dealing lethal damage and setting the target on fire. The target suffers additional fire damage over time.
Blazing_Arrow.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Nether_Arrow.display_help: You fire an arrow of nether energy at your target. The target suffers smashing damage from the force of the blow and suffers negative energy damage over time, as the energy seeps into their soul. There is a chance that the target will be immobilized by this attack. There is also a chance that some of the spirit energy will splash on collision with the target, creating a pool of nether energy at the target's feet.
Nether_Arrow.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), Chance for Immobilize(Foe) and Debuff(Foe)
Nether_Arrow.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy over time. There is also a chance you are immobilized or ensnared in nether energy.

Crystal_Arrow.display_help: You fire an arrow of crystalline nether energy at your target. This arrow pierces the target, causing lethal damage, while the frigid temperature of the arrow causes additional cold damage. This temperature has a chance of crystallizing vapor in the air around the target, giving a small chance of holding the opponent.
Crystal_Arrow.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal, Cold), Chance for Hold(Foe)
Crystal_Arrow.display_target_help: You are held in place and unable to take any actions.

Hack.display_help: You hack your opponent, causing lethal damage and reducing their defense.
Hack.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick slash that deals lethal damage and reduces a target's defense.
Slash.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Nether_Blade.display_help: You discharge a beam of nether energy from your sword, striking the target for negative energy damage and causing negative energy damage over time.
Nether_Blade.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy)
Nether_Blade.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time.

Slice.display_help: You slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. This causes lethal damage and reduces the defense of all affected targets.
Slice.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Whirling_Sword.display_help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range for lethal damage and reducing their defense. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take additional lethal damage over time.
Whirling_Sword.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All)
Whirling_Sword.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Head_Splitter.display_help: You perform a devastating attack that deals lethal damage and reduces a target's defense. The target may also be knocked to the ground.
Head_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown
Head_Splitter.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Dark_Blast.display_help: You fire a blast of dark energy at a single target. This attack causes negative energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit.
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: You are suffering a reduced chance to hit.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You can create a rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, immobilizing them while the tentacles drain their life and reduce their chance to hit.
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Negative Energy), High DoT (Smashing), -ToHit(Foe), Immobilize(Foe)
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: You are suffering smashing damage over time. You are also immobilized and suffer a reduced chance to hit.

Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack causes smashing damage and sends foes flying while reducing their chance to hit.
Torrent.display_target_help: You are suffering a reduced chance to hit.

Twilight_Grasp.display_help: You channel negative energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. This energy drains your target's life force and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's regeneration, chance to hit and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed.
Twilight_Grasp.display_target_help: Your damage potential, chance to hit and regeneration rate have been reduced.

Nether_Well.display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets are stuck and cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow
Nether_Well.display_target_help: Your movement speed and damage resistance have been reduced. You also find it more difficult to jump or fly away.

Shadow_Fall.display_help: Envelops you and your nearby teammates in a shroud of darkness. Shadow Fall does not grant Invisibility, but it does make you harder to detect. Even if you are discovered, Shadow Fall grants a bonus to defense against all attacks and resistance to Fear, while reducing energy, negative energy, and psionic damage.
Shadow_Fall.display_short_help: PBAoE, Stealth (Team), +DEF(Team, All), +RES(Team, Energy, Negative, Psionics, Fear)

Nether_Void.display_help: You envelop your target in a mass of nether energy which can break through an opponent's phased state. The target is held and unable to move as the nether energy drains their life essence, causing negative energy damage over time.
Nether_Void.display_target_help: You are held in place and are suffering negative energy damage over time. These effects will apply to you even if phased.

Fade.display_help: You partially bring yourself and all nearby teammates into the Netherworld, vastly increasing their Defense to all attacks for a very short period of time as well as increasing their resistance to Defense Debuffs.

Dread_Servant.display_help: Summons a Dark Servant to your aid. This Dark Servant possesses an assortment of dark powers to weaken your foes.

Penumbral_Grasp.display_help: You can create a rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, immobilizing them while the tentacles drain their life and reduce their chance to hit.
Penumbral_Grasp.display_target_help: You are suffering smashing and negative energy damage over time. You are also immobilized and suffer a reduced chance to hit.

Resist_Physical_Damage.display_help: You are naturally tough and inherently resistant to smashing and lethal damage, in addition to Defense Debuffs.

Nether_Energy.display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets are stuck and cannot jump or fly.
Nether_Energy.display_target_help: Your movement speed and damage resistance have been reduced. You also find it more difficult to jump or fly away.

Damage_MN.display_help: The Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage, but have a weakness to energy attacks.
Damage_MN.display_target_help: The Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage, but have a weakness to energy attacks.

Damage_LT.display_help: The Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage, but have a weakness to energy attacks.
Damage_LT.display_target_help: The Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage, but have a weakness to energy attacks.

Damage_BS.display_help: The more powerful Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage and have lost their weakness to energy attacks.
Damage_BS.display_target_help: The more powerful Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage and have lost their weakness to energy attacks.

Damage_EB.display_help: The more powerful Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage and have lost their weakness to energy attacks.
Damage_EB.display_target_help: The more powerful Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage and have lost their weakness to energy attacks.

Damage_AV.display_help: The more powerful Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage and have lost their weakness to energy attacks.
Damage_AV.display_target_help: The more powerful Black Knights are naturally resistant to negative energy damage and have lost their weakness to energy attacks.

Damage_Pet.display_help: Dread Servant is resistant to Negative Energy but Vulnerable to Energy.

Deflection.display_help: Your mastery of the shield allows you to easily deflect melee attacks, and attacks that do get through your ironclad defenses tend to do less damage.

Active_Defense.display_help: You gain the benefits of training with your shield, with bonus protection against Sleep, Disorient, Fear, Immobilize, Confusion, Repel, Knockback, Hold and Defense Debuff effects.
Active_Defense.display_short_help: Auto (Self), +RES (Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Repel, Knockback, Defense Debuff)

Phalanx_Fighting.display_help: Fighting very near your allies allows you to deflect attacks much easier. You will gain a small bonus to your melee, ranged and area of effect defense for each ally near you.

Grant_Cover.display_help: You are able to use your shield to defend nearby allies. Any teammates who remain nearby gain a bonus to their defense. Additionally, the caster and teammates will gain some resistance to defense and recharge rate debuffs.
Grant_Cover.display_short_help: PBAoE, +DEF(Team, All but Psionic), +RES(Team, Defense Debuff, Recharge Debuff)

Mercurial_Blow.display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow from your staff, dealing smashing damage and reducing defenses.

Serpents_Reach.display_help: You fully extend your staff and release a burst of energy at a distant target. This target suffers smashing damage and may be knocked down.
Serpents_Reach.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)
Serpents_Reach.display_target_help: You have been knocked down by the force of this attack!

Innocuous_Strikes.display_help: You batter your the feet and legs of nearby opponents with a flurry of blows from your staff. This attack deals smashing damage to all foes within its cone. All affected targets will have their movement speed reduced, with a chance of being immobilized briefly.
Innocuous_Strikes.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DoT (Smashing), -Speed(Foe, All), Chance for Immobilize(Foe)
Innocuous_Strikes.display_target_help: You are suffering smashing damage over time and your movement speed has been reduced. You may also be immobilized.

Taunt.display_help: You taunt your targets, provoking their anger and focusing their attacks.

Defensive_Sweep.display_help: You quickly strike your opponent from a defensive position, causing smashing damage. The force of the blow also has a chance to slow their response time. Additionally, your chance to hit and your defense against melee and smashing attacks is increased for a short time.
Defensive_Sweep.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), +DEF(Self, Melee, Smashing), +ToHit(Self), Chance for -Rech(Foe)
Defensive_Sweep.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Crushing_Blow.display_help: You swing your weapon at your target with tremendous force. The blow causes smashing damage and internal trauma, which causes lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in movement speed and ability to fly.
Crushing_Blow.display_target_help: You are bleeding internally. Your movement speed and your ability to fly have been reduced.

Penumbral_Strike.display_help: You swing your weapon in a wide arc and create a nether shockwave which travels in the direction of your target. Opponents hit by the shockwave suffer negative energy damage. Targets will also be knocked back by the force of the blow, or exhausted by the absorbed energy, immobilizing them.
Penumbral_Strike.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Negative Energy), Knockback(Foe) OR Immobilize(Foe)

Follow_Through.display_help: You channel your energy into an especially powerful swing. This swing does significant smashing damage and causes sufficient trauma to induce lethal damage over time in the target.
Follow_Through.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), Minor DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockup(Foe), -Fly(Foe)
Follow_Through.display_target_help: You have been knocked back and suffer exhaustion, reducing your regeneration and recovery.
